name: Code: NOTHING
description:
CODE:NOTHING

Combine SURVIVAL SHOOTER  with WORD GAME

Pick up and place LETTERs to form CODEs that will improve your stat, sommon allies or even release a giant explosion!

Code Example: 

HP = heal 2 HP

ROBOT = sommon a ally robot

DIE = kill enemies around you

==========================================

HOW  TO PLAY:

WASD/Arrow keys = Move

Left Mouse Button = Shoot

SPACE = pick / drop letter

Mouse Wheel = Scroll Code list

TAB = see the description of the CODE, also stop the game

==========================================

GOAL:

Survival 30 day and fight the BOSS!

==========================================

TIPS:

Simplest code to try is  DOG which will sommon a dog that fight for you

Use code to heal your self and unit : HP, HEAL, CURE

Build up your own stat with SPEED, AMMO, RELOAD

Try to sommon a lot of unti and double their number with DOUBLE

==========================================

Entry for LD45

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/codenothing

==========================================

RESOURCES:

https://soundimage.org/
